idea-plugin.name: EasyChar
idea-plugin.description:
function Overview

  • Chinese character replacement plugin EasyChar

function Points

  • Automatically replace commonly used encoding characters such as commas, periods, semicolons, parentheses, and question marks in both Chinese and English
  • No need to repeatedly switch between Chinese and English input methods. Increase keyboard lifespan and reduce code bugs caused by Chinese and English characters
  • This plugin supports the latest version of the JetBrains IDE family bucket

instructions

  • When the following characters are entered ( ，。；！（）「」《》), they will be automatically converted to corresponding English characters
  • If you want to input the above Chinese characters, first input them, and then input the desired Chinese characters
